Light of Heaven.name: Light of Heaven
Light of Heaven.flavor: The pain of your injuries unleashes the ire of your patron. You will see this battle to its end.
Light of Heaven.trigger: You are bloodied by an attack.
Light of Heaven.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain regeneration 15, shed bright light in a 10 square radius, and grant all allies within the light resist 10 necrotic.
